creator: rogersl@sprynet.com
text:
To reproduce:

1. cd to tomcat_home/server/lib.
2. java -classpath catalina.jar org.apache.catalina.realm.JDBCRealm -a MD5 password
3. Error message shows can't find bundle for base name
org.apache.tomcat.resources.LocalStrings

Workaround:

1. Unpack catalina.jar and copy org.apache.catalina.authentication.LocalStrings
to org.apache.tomcat.resources.LocalStrings
2. Repack and replace the catalina.jar that ships with Tomcat.

Occurs on Windows 2000 Server SP1 and Linux Redhat 6.2 with Sun JDK 1.3.
The constant value has been fixed.
creator: remm@apache.org
